values:
this entry is specifically for the express purpose of people who aren't added to my journal and want to say something; it can be about, anything, really, including an add request. all comments are screened by default, and anonymous posting is disabled. I highly doubt anyone will abuse this, but if such a case happens, I may remove it. that said, I want to use this space for this as well:
Save The World - One Click At A Time!

On each of these websites, you can click a button to support the cause -- each click creates funding, and costs you nothing! Bookmark these sites, and click once a day!





Click here to post this on your page or 'blog
we must pursue compassion, kindness, love, awareness, increase it within us, and express it externally and inspire others to do the same by such action.
